SuperHero Dreams - 2

I dream I am Captain America,
I would represent grand ideals beyond personal grief,
I would be looked up to and I would be loved,
I would fight to survive , not survive to fight,
I would silence desperate screams,
I wouldn’t need to dream.
                      
                                  -Batman ( Bruce Wayne )

Written on August 27, 2008
